summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2569, for the improvement of 9th Avenue South, from Holgate Street to Bayview Street; all in the City of Seattle, by construction of a wooden box sewer, under Ordinance No. 29888 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
